name: Charing Cross

reviews.title: Loved the Thistle!
reviews.text: We loved this hotel! We found it on Londontown.com and cross checked it on Trip Advisor. We stayed there earlier this month for 5 nights. It's in the heart of London, the staff was great, the rates were good, the room is magnificent! We didn't have a view, but we had a huge bathroom, radio, hair dryer, fridge, big and cozy bed. We will definently stay here again, or any other Thistle hotels in England when we go back.

My friends and I stayed in this hotel for three nights in September. The location is the biggest selling point for this hotel - it's right by Trafalgar Square and within walking distance of Westminster Abbey and Houses of Parliament/Big Ben. The hotel itself is right above the Charing Cross tube/rail station and about a block or two from the Embankment tube station.
reviews.title: Fabulous Location

reviews.text: The rooms were quite nice, and our bathroom was very spacious. Given how expensive hotels are in London, we got these rooms for a fairly decent price through Hotels.
reviews.title: Great location.

reviews.text: Walking from the lobby to the rooms was a little odd, though. You had to climb the stairs (or take an elevator) up a level, walk down a hallway and then take another elevator up to the rooms. If you have mobility issues, this could be a pain.
reviews.title: Excellent location and price!

description: Modernized Victorian-era Railroad Hotel adjacent to Charing Cross Station.
